items.title: Collaborative Task Boards
items.description: Implement shared task boards where team members can create, assign, and track tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new task board and invite team members
Tasks can be assigned to specific team members
Changes to tasks are visible to all members within 5 seconds
Users can update task status (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Done)
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users per board
UI updates should occur within 5 seconds of a change

notes: Requirement is high-level; assumptions made about real-time updates and basic task board functionality. Further clarification needed on integrations, permissions, and mobile support.
